function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of communication with retailers about posted signs","Impact":"Ineffective signage and communication of disease prevention measures","Mitigation":"Initiate communication with retailers to ensure effective signage and communication","Technologies":"Communication platforms, digital signage tools","People":"Retailers, customers, general public","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Limited supply of professional signs due to demand and production capacity","Impact":"Inadequate availability of effective signage for disease prevention","Mitigation":"Coordinate with printing companies to increase production capacity, prioritize production based on demand","Technologies":"Supply chain management tools, production optimization software","People":"Retailers, printing companies","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Lack of follow-up research with customers to assess subjective properties of signs","Impact":"Inability to understand customer perception and effectiveness of signage","Mitigation":"Conduct follow-up research with customers to assess subjective properties of signs","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analysis software","People":"Customers, retailers, general public","Owner":"Research team"}]}
